title: So... OCE skin?
body:
So it has been at the very least months since anyone from Riot even mentioned the OCE exclusive skin which was promised to be distributed amongst the players who transferred or created accounts on this server early. They said that they didn't want to create an Australian skin, but rather that it should be Oceanic on a whole.

While this might be a difficult proposition... could we get an update, Riot? It has been two whole seasons since this skin was promised and yet no progress has been stated at all. At this point I would rather you tell us the skin was canned and that you can't keep your promise (a promise which applied to every other server mind you) than to continue keeping the server in the dark and hoping we forget about it (which a lot of people have actually done since the discussion about it was SO SO SO long ago, back in 2013).

Please tell us **SOMETHING**.

replies.body:
Hi everyone! Apologies for coming to this thread late. 

Here's the basic situation; we have not given up on the Oceanic skin. We had a few ideas in the pipeline which were strong contenders which hit some snags, but those snags have now been cleared and the process is again moving forward.

I know this isn't a very solid update but I can pledge this - we have not given up on the skin. IF at some stage in the future we do get to the point where we don't think an Oceanic skin will happen we will let you all know along with the honest reasons for why.

> [{quoted}](name=CptStupendous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-20T07:39:45.779+0000)
>
> Hi everyone! Apologies for coming to this thread late. 
> 
> Here's the basic situation; we have not given up on the Oceanic skin. We had a few ideas in the pipeline which were strong contenders which hit some snags, but those snags have now been cleared and the process is again moving forward.
> 
> I know this isn't a very solid update but I can pledge this - we have not given up on the skin. IF at some stage in the future we do get to the point where we don't think an Oceanic skin will happen we will let you all know along with the honest reasons for why.

Have you considered the idea of rather then trying to put specific things from 20+ cultures into one skin which probably causes issues that you could just do some broad spectrum ocean themed skin or something, at this point I think everyone would rather a more non-specific skin because it's just unrealistic to try and cram so many cultures into one.
Realistically we want something that appeals to Aussie's and Kiwi's alike. It's funny though, even though our two countries are so close in so many ways there's not a whole lot we have in common!

How about anything star-oriented? The southern cross is on both flags, maybe Soraka might be a candidate?
Or a J. Cook themed Gangplank skin. Or Mundo. He explores what he pleases after all.
Idk, just throwing out random things.
I'm not sure about the star. But the Captain Cook theme would work nicely.
Some good ideas here! *notes down*
Thanks man :)
We have the ANZACs...

You're right about that, the ANZAC history and tradition is something that unites our countries. BUT, at the same time we feel like the ANZAC story isn't one that's suitable to be turned into a skin. It just wouldn't be right.

Right. I get it. It was just an idea, and I really didn't think much into it. Sorry

Thanks for replying to my idea though. Makes me feel like my idea was actually considered. :)
No need to be sorry!! I only had the answer because it's come up before :-)

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-21T03:59:26.575+0000)
>
> We have the ANZACs...

we also have people that would find that offensive
I think you can go about making it not offensive.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=000500000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-21T12:17:01.667+0000)
>
> I think you can go about making it not offensive.

No you can't as people have said before this is a game where people fight and die it would be offensive to have such a skin in this game, imagine someone who is an Anzac or was related to one they probably want to forget the horrors of war then they see an Anzac character in a video game running into fights and dying like it's something to take lightly, people would get triggered/offended.
Yeah, I guess in this case it's better not to try that at all.

Yeah, this is true. The ANZACs do run deep in both our nation's histories. It would be foolhardy to make a skin that takes it too lightly. It would just be a tricky thing to pull off with a positive reception, let alone without a negative consequence.

Almost all regions had skins made for them to celebrate their launch. Pool Party Ziggs was already a thing before OCE servers existed so it doesnt count.

> New Server Celebration Skins:

>Sultan Tryandamere for Turkey Server

>Special Forces Gangplank for Brazil Server

>Glaive Warrior Pantheon for Romania Server

>Mythic Cassiopeia for Greece Server

>Winged Hussar Xin Zhao for Poland Server

>Gladiator Draven for Italy Server

>Ghost bride Morgana for Latin America Server

>Bear Calvary Sejuani for Russia Server

>______________ for Oceanic Server (To be announced)
Isn't there a Sultan Gangplank? Or is that unrelated to the server release of Turkey?

Sultan Gangplank was made as a "1 year anniversary" for Turkish servers.

Nice slap in the face to OCE who are yet to get one skin LOL
Sultana Gangplank Kappa

LOL

When multiculturalism is bad because people can't 'stereotype' denizens of an area.
when i transferred, i had the pool party ziggs skin unlocked, i had never bought it so i assumed that was the skin

> [{quoted}](name=xAerOx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-18T04:41:37.934+0000)
>
> when i transferred, i had the pool party ziggs skin unlocked, i had never bought it so i assumed that was the skin

that gave that skin out as an incentive to transfer over.
it wasn't made for OCE though
So far, tho, that IS the OCE skin. Or at least, it's always been referred to as such.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-05-18T05:52:06.616+0000)
>
> So far, tho, that IS the OCE skin. Or at least, it's always been referred to as such.

but it's not the OCE skin. no one that knows what they're talking about has called it the OCE skin. it was more like a buy one get one free sort of deal.

Inquiring...
...

Hm. Ok. So apparently they're having trouble finding a common theme for Oceania (they don't want to make a purely Australian or purely NewZealan...dese? skin) and they're stuck like that.
So maybe we should... Idk, brainstorm?
new zealandese? youre joking aye?

> [{quoted}](name=Neville Bartos,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-18T08:18:13.991+0000)
>
> new zealandese? youre joking aye?

calm down, try not to send your pack of kiwis at him (lol)
OMG NOT THE KIWIS

Beg forgiveness. Not my first language :P
(Not even my first hemisphere, but hey, i'm getting used to it)
damn, i swapped as soon as you possibly could and i didn't even hear about this lol, maybe theyre letting it sink down and hopefully no one remembers.. :L

Im a New Zealander right, and i just say give us an aussie skin! who cares, 80% of the people in the server will be Aussie anyway, RIOT OCE itself is in aussie, and no one is gunna be offended if the skin doesn't quite relate to their specific country (or shouldn't be anyway), you cant please everyone, so dont try, and i for one have no problems with a gumtree maokai or a boxing glove kangaroo Vi or any of those other cool ideas i have seen around.
Ned kelly graves
Vegemite Veigar? Pavlova Pantheon? Weetbix Wukong? There are a few things in common.
Nutrigain Nautilus.
Merino Alistar xD

If you're after something that can be enjoyed by both Aussies and Kiwis, why not look into a Rugby skin?

Sure, it's an 'outdoor' sport and no where near as good as eSports, but it's something that both Aus and NZ always play against each other in.

Hmm.
Ireland, Britain, and a handful of other Commonwealth nations have a good rugby presence in their country. 

That's like selling a "Basketball" server skin with the release of NA. Discarding the fact that other countries outside of that region play that game as well. But I get what you mean.

Riot could we please get a skin of Ivan Milat? To promote the new Australia series "Catching Milat", it's clear that he's the epitome of Australian and New Zealand youth today  - all barbaric, deranged, and primitive. If you do follow through with this skin it would be best suited to Lee Sin - so mobile that he's a coward, and so blind that he's parochial, common characteristics among Australian and New Zealand youth.

Thank you for considering this skin Riot, best of wishes in the future!
atleast ADMIT you're too lazy to make one
Atleast READ what Riot CptStupendous wrote 5 hours before you posted your comment.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mZo61AAd,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-05-20T15:54:29.332+0000)
>
> Atleast READ what Riot CptStupendous wrote 5 hours before you posted your comment.

i dont scroll through the whole thread soz mb
